about.heading: About Me
about.bio: I am a Machine Learning Engineer with extensive experience and Ph.D. in Robotics and Artificial Intelligence from Stevens Institute of Technology, with a strong focus on developing autonomous systems for smart manufacturing. My research integrates Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science, and Electrical Engineering expertise to create self-aware automated manufacturing systems aligned with Industry 4.0. I have extensive hands-on experience in Computer Vision, Deep Learning, and Reinforcement Learning, with proven ability to consistently achieve results in both academic research and industrial applications.
